channel.title: Why do you hate Runescape?
channel.description:
Title explains it all
I have my own reasons, i want to know yours.

item.title: Why do you hate Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @famoushope famoushope
item.description:
@famoushope wrote:

i quit as i got perm banned for doing bolt glitches, & i only did pking which turned to shit.
i enjoyed pking but often killing people for 20m+ and getting junk drops, was no way to make money.

atm RWT is more then ever, its just done more professionally now, botting is also more then ever aswell, some of the scripts that have been coded by rsbot.net etc are amazing.

Read full topic

new weapons that are gay and over priced
inflation/deflation of prices dramatically…
and yea,[/quote]

item.title: Why do you hate Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

I appear to hate everything about it for reasons I cannot explain. Friend had me go on his account to “do two easy quests” for him. Within 5 mins he copped at least 200 lines of msn-rage and me deciding to just sit in Varrock swearing.

I also hate their new pking - I actually quite enjoyed Bounty Hunter craters.

Read full topic

No Wilderness. . .
Low level pure mage sucks now
Everyone is a pure str in f2p
Everyone is 40 years of age.
Fagex Sucks.
Big time.
NBA2k11 Just came out so Runescape just lost the battle allied with EA Sports, lol.

item.title: Why do you hate Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Banned you without a reason - You obviously did something wrong if they banned you, they don't randomly ban people without any reason at all.

Proof?

Proof you were banned for no reason?

Proof that it makes more people play? Alot of people have left RuneScape for that excact reason that a 99 takes way to long

Proof it makes people leave?
Not only is getting 99’s pretty easy, the challenge should make more people play, and if they don’t want to work for it then they can go play Pac man with cheats on.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do you hate Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

i never PK , but i love to go revenant hunting XD

i also like the new graphics and gameframe , they’re a whole lot better then the old ones…

i stopped playing RS when they added trade limit , re-started and re-stopped a few times since then aswell

i moved to RSPS when my friends told me about SabSabiOnline , then i discovered the entire RSPS community like R-S and ofcourse moparscape =D

i MIGHT return to real RS , but i really doubt it…

Read full topic

item.title: Why do you hate Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Eyfia, post:97, topic:361727”]- Trade Limit

  • Very very hard 99’s!!!
  • Also all the membership stuff
  • Hard to get any good item
  • Also they banned me just for no reason, I think[/quote]

Trade Limit - I Agree
Very Hard 99’s - I disagree, The challenge makes people play more
All the Membership stuff - How do they expect to make money without it?
Hard to get good items - You have to know what to do to get those items
Banned you without a reason - You obviously did something wrong if they banned you, they don’t randomly ban people without any reason at all.

Read full topic
